translations: v.践踏；行走；（小心）行事；踩；沿着……走（tread的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Ouch! You trod on my toe!
sentences.translation: 哎哟！你踩着我的脚指头了！

sentences.sentence: Few people had trod this path before.
sentences.translation: 以前没有多少人走过这条小路。

sentences.sentence: She trod casually, enjoying the touch of the damp grass on her feet.
sentences.translation: 她随意行走，享受着脚底接触着湿草的感觉。
